When you imagine an ecosystem,

you might picture an old-growth forest, or
maybe a coral reef.
But an ecosystem can be any place

where living things interact with each other
and their environment.

It can be very small, like a single tide pool,
or very large, like an entire grassland.
It can also be very odd.

Around the world, living things have managed
to build truly extraordinary ecosystems

in some of the last places you would think
to look.

go to show
how innovative and adaptable life really is!
